title: Story of the Sun
subtle: Pourquoi Tale (fiction), 569 words, Level M (Grade 2), Lexile 520L
description: This original story is written in the pourquoi tale style. Story of the Sun is about a young boy's search for answers. He wonders where the sun comes from each morning and where it goes each night. A wise woman helps him find the answers to his questions.
